snippet: The rookie Amanda Chidester hit a grand slam as the United States beat Brazil, 9-0, in five innings at the World Cup in Oklahoma City.
abstract: Amanda Chidester hits a grand slam to push United States to a 9-0 victory over Brazil in five innings at the World Cup of softball.
lead_paragraph: The rookie Amanda Chidester hit a grand slam as the United States beat Brazil, 9-0, in five innings at the World Cup in Oklahoma City.

headline.seo: Rookie’s Slam Leads U.S. in Softball
